citations.narrative:
There are three areas of wire mesh that are unraveling and broken with sharp ends protruding into the enclosures
for the coyote, and fox. The sharp wires may injure the animals and must be repaired or removed to protect the
health and safety of the animals.
Correct by September 28, 2014.
Inspection and Exit interview conducted with Volunteer Animal Caretaker.

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
There are three areas of wire mesh that are unraveling and broken with sharp ends protruding into the enclosures
for the coyote, and fox.  The sharp wires may injure the animals and must be repaired or removed to protect the
health and safety of the animals. 
Correct by September 28, 2014.
Inspection and Exit interview conducted with Volunteer Animal Caretaker.

species.common: GRAY WOLF / GREY WOLF / TIMBER WOLF
RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
